cast.name: 丽贝卡·莱恩斯 Rebecca Lines

introduction: SWEET TOXINS is a saga that tells the story of a family who owns America's largest pharmaceutical company. Facing the threatening possibility of being shut down by a Japanese competitor, the family's power-mad matriarch is forced to unite with her estranged daughter in order to save the family business. A power game of lies, scheming and corrupt activity will not only lead the family to the limit of their existence - it will also become the most prominent case in criminal history.
